Class EpilogueScreen

breakout.core.screens.Screen
breakout.core.screens.EpilogueScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
EpilogueScreen
public abstract class EpilogueScreen extends Screen
The screen which handles all the logic and rendering for the epilogue or end.
